snippet.name: Handler Template
snippet.starttext:
<cfsetting enablecfoutputonly="true" showdebugoutput="false" />
<cfoutput>
<form action="#application.oCustomFunctions.getCurrentUrl()#" method="post">
<input type="hidden" name="bHandleForm" value="1" /> <input type="hidden" name="ideEventInfo" value="#form.ideEventInfo#" /> <button type="submit">Submit</button>
</form>
</cfoutput>
<cfsetting enablecfoutputonly="false" />
